00059     UIManager::UIManager()
00060         : HoveredButton(NULL),
00061           HoveredWidget(NULL),
00062           WidgetFocus(NULL)
00063     {
00064         Silver = new Gorilla::Silverback();
00065         InputQueryer = new InputQueryTool();
00066         Priority = -35;
00067     }
00068 
00069     UIManager::~UIManager()
00070     {
00071         DestroyAllScreens();
00072         delete Silver;
00073     }
00074 
00075     void UIManager::HoverChecks()
00076     {
00077         if(HoveredButton)
00078         {
00079             if(HoveredButton->CheckMouseHover())
00080             {
00081                 return;
00082             }
00083         }
00084         if(HoveredWidget)
00085         {
00086             if(HoveredWidget->CheckMouseHover())
00087             {
00088                 HoveredWidget->Update();
00089                 return;
00090             }
00091         }
00092         HoveredButton = CheckButtonMouseIsOver();
00093         if(!HoveredButton)
00094         {
00095             HoveredWidget = CheckWidgetMouseIsOver();
00096             if(HoveredWidget)
00097             {
00098                 //HoveredButton = HoveredWidget->GetHoveredButton();
00099                 HoveredWidget->Update();
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     void UIManager::WidgetFocusUpdate()
00105     {
00106         if(HoveredWidget || WidgetFocus)
00107         {
00108             MetaCode::ButtonState State = InputQueryer->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00109             if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00110             {
00111                 WidgetFocus = HoveredWidget;
00112             }
00113             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00114             {
00115                 if(HoveredWidget != WidgetFocus && WidgetFocus)
00116                     WidgetFocus->Update(true);
00117             }
00118             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00119             {
00120                 if(HoveredWidget != WidgetFocus)
00121                     WidgetFocus->Update(true);
00122                 WidgetFocus = NULL;
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     void UIManager::Initialize()
00128     {
00129     }
00130 
00131     void UIManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00132     {
00133         InputQueryer->GatherEvents();
00134         HoverChecks();
00135         WidgetFocusUpdate();
00136     }

00138     void UIManager::LoadGorilla(const String& Name)
00139     {
00140         Silver->loadAtlas(Name);
00141     }

00158     UIScreen* UIManager::CreateScreen(const String& Screen, const String& Atlas, const String& Viewport)
00159     {
00160         Ogre::Viewport* OgrePort = GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetOgreViewport(Viewport);
00161         Gorilla::Screen* guiscreen = Silver->createScreen(OgrePort, Atlas);
00162         UIScreen* physscreen = new UIScreen(Screen, guiscreen);
00163         Screens.push_back(physscreen);
00164         return physscreen;
00165     }
00166 
00167     UIScreen* UIManager::GetScreen(const String& Name)
00168     {
00169         std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin();
00170         for ( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00171         {
00172             if ( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00173             {
00174                 UIScreen* Screen = (*it);
00175                 return Screen;
00176             }
00177         }
00178         return 0;
00179     }
00180 
00181     UIScreen* UIManager::GetScreen(Whole Index)
00182     {
00183         return Screens[Index];
00184     }
00185 
00186     Whole UIManager::GetNumScreens()
00187     {
00188         return Screens.size();
00189     }
00190 
00191     void UIManager::DestroyScreen(UIScreen* Screen)
00192     {
00193         if(Screens.empty())
00194             return;
00195         for( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00196         {
00197             if( Screen == (*it) )
00198             {
00199                 delete (*it);
00200                 Screens.erase(it);
00201                 return;
00202             }
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     void UIManager::DestroyAllScreens()
00207     {
00208         if(Screens.empty())
00209             return;
00210         for( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00211         {
00212             delete (*it);
00213         }
00214         Screens.clear();
00215         return;
00216     }
00217 
00218     UILayer* UIManager::GetLayer(String& Name)
00219     {
00220         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00221         {
00222             UILayer* Layer = Screens[x]->GetLayer(Name);
00223             if(NULL!=Layer)
00224                 return Layer;
00225         }
00226         return 0;
00227     }
00228 
00229     UI::Button* UIManager::CheckButtonMouseIsOver()
00230     {
00231         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00232         {
00233             if( Screens[x]->IsVisible() )
00234             {
00235                 UI::Button* button = Screens[x]->CheckButtonMouseIsOver();
00236                 if(button)
00237                 {
00238                     return button;
00239                 }
00240             }
00241         }
00242         return 0;
00243     }
00244 
00245     UI::Widget* UIManager::CheckWidgetMouseIsOver()
00246     {
00247         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00248         {
00249             if( Screens[x]->IsVisible() )
00250             {
00251                 UI::Widget* widget = Screens[x]->CheckWidgetMouseIsOver();
00252                 if(widget)
00253                 {
00254                     return widget;
00255                 }
00256             }
00257         }
00258         return 0;
00259     }
00260 
00261     bool UIManager::MouseIsInUISystem()
00262     {
00263         if(HoveredButton || HoveredWidget || WidgetFocus)
00264         {
00265             return true;
00266         }else{
00267             return false;
00268         }
00269     }

00271     Vector2 UIManager::GetWindowDimensions()
00272     {
00273         /// @todo This is the second occurance of needing to specify the namespace to declare data
00274         /// without any apparent reason.  If possible a pattern/explaination should be found.
00275         phys::GraphicsManager* Graphics = GetGameWorld()->GetGraphicsManager();
00276         Vector2 Window((Real)Graphics->getRenderWidth(),(Real)Graphics->getRenderHeight());
00277         return Window;
00278     }
